name: execute_code
description: Executes a Python code string and captures the output.

code_string.description: The string of Python code to execute.

name: execute_script
description: Execute a Python script from a file and return its exit code, stdout, and stderr.

script_path.description: The file path to the Python script to execute.

name: write_to_file
description: Writes string (text) or byte (binary) content to a file, overwriting the file if it exists.

file_path.description: Full path to the destination file.

content.description: The string or bytes content to write to the file.
